content:
ReliableStateManagerReplicatorSettings ReliableStateManagerReplicatorSettings Class

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Data
Assembly:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Data.Interfaces.dll

Settings that configure the replicator

Edit

In this Article

public class ReliableStateManagerReplicatorSettingsPublic Class ReliableStateManagerReplicatorSettings
Inheritance
ObjectObject
ReliableStateManagerReplicatorSettingsReliableStateManagerReplicatorSettings

Inherited Members

System.Object

Equals(Object, Object)Equals(Object, Object)
ReferenceEquals(Object, Object)ReferenceEquals(Object, Object)
GetType()GetType()
MemberwiseClone()MemberwiseClone()

Properties

BatchAcknowledgementInterval BatchAcknowledgementInterval

Edit

Gets or sets the amount of time that the replicator waits after receiving an operation before sending back an acknowledgment The default value is 5 milliseconds.

public TimeSpan? BatchAcknowledgementInterval { get; set; }Public Property BatchAcknowledgementInterval As TimeSpan?
Value
Nullable<TimeSpan> Nullable(Of TimeSpan)

The batch acknowledgment interval.

CheckpointThresholdInMB CheckpointThresholdInMB

Edit

Gets or sets the checkpoint threshold. A checkpoint will be initiated when the log usage exceeds this value. Default value is 50.

public int ? CheckpointThresholdInMB { get; set; }Public Property CheckpointThresholdInMB As Integer?
Value
Nullable<Int32> Nullable(Of Int32)

The checkpoint threshold.

InitialCopyQueueSize InitialCopyQueueSize

Edit

Gets or sets the initial size of the copy operation queue inside the replicator, which contains copy Operations. Default value is 64. The value must be a power of 2 and the unit is 'Number of operations'

public long ? InitialCopyQueueSize { get; set; }Public Property InitialCopyQueueSize As Long?
Value
Nullable<Int64> Nullable(Of Int64)

The initial copy queue size.

InitialPrimaryReplicationQueueSize InitialPrimaryReplicationQueueSize

Edit

Gets or sets the initial primary replication queue size. Default value is 64. The value must be a power of 2 and the unit is 'Number of operations'

public long ? InitialPrimaryReplicationQueueSize { get; set; }Public Property InitialPrimaryReplicationQueueSize As Long?
Value
Nullable<Int64> Nullable(Of Int64)

The initial primary replication queue size.

InitialSecondaryReplicationQueueSize InitialSecondaryReplicationQueueSize

Edit

Gets or sets the initial secondary replication queue size. Default value is 64. The value must be a power of 2 and the unit is 'Number of operations'

public long ? InitialSecondaryReplicationQueueSize { get; set; }Public Property InitialSecondaryReplicationQueueSize As Long?
Value
Nullable<Int64> Nullable(Of Int64)

The initial secondary replication queue size.

MaxAccumulatedBackupLogSizeInMB MaxAccumulatedBackupLogSizeInMB

Edit

Gets or sets the max size for an accumulated backup log across backups. An incremental backup requests will fail if the incremental backup would generate a backup log that would cause the accumulated backup logs since the relevant full backup to be larger than this size. In such cases, user is required to take a full backup. Default value is 800.

public int ? MaxAccumulatedBackupLogSizeInMB { get; set; }Public Property MaxAccumulatedBackupLogSizeInMB As Integer?
Value
Nullable<Int32> Nullable(Of Int32)

The max accumulated backup log size in MB.

MaxCopyQueueSize MaxCopyQueueSize

Edit

Gets or sets the maximum size of the copy operation queue inside Replicator, which contains copy Operations. Default value is 1024. The value must be a power of 2 and the unit is 'Number of operations'

public long ? MaxCopyQueueSize { get; set; }Public Property MaxCopyQueueSize As Long?
Value
Nullable<Int64> Nullable(Of Int64)

The max copy queue size.

MaxMetadataSizeInKB MaxMetadataSizeInKB

Edit

Gets or sets the Amount of extra persistent storage space reserved for the replicator specified in kilobytes that is associated with this replica. This value must be a multiple of 4. The default value is 4. The unit is KB.

public int ? MaxMetadataSizeInKB { get; set; }Public Property MaxMetadataSizeInKB As Integer?
Value
Nullable<Int32> Nullable(Of Int32)

The max metadata size.

MaxPrimaryReplicationQueueMemorySize MaxPrimaryReplicationQueueMemorySize

Edit

Gets or sets the max primary replication queue memory size. Default value is 0, which implies there is no memory limitation. The unit is Bytes

public long ? MaxPrimaryReplicationQueueMemorySize { get; set; }Public Property MaxPrimaryReplicationQueueMemorySize As Long?
Value
Nullable<Int64> Nullable(Of Int64)

The max primary replication queue memory size.

MaxPrimaryReplicationQueueSize MaxPrimaryReplicationQueueSize

Edit

Gets or sets the max primary replication queue size. Default value is 1024. The value must be a power of 2 and the unit is 'Number of operations'

public long ? MaxPrimaryReplicationQueueSize { get; set; }Public Property MaxPrimaryReplicationQueueSize As Long?
Value
Nullable<Int64> Nullable(Of Int64)

The max primary replication queue size.

MaxRecordSizeInKB MaxRecordSizeInKB

Edit

Gets or sets the largest record size which the replicator may write specified in kilobytes for the log that is associated with this replica. This value must be a multiple of 4 and greater than or equal to 128. The default value is 1024. The unit is KB.

public int ? MaxRecordSizeInKB { get; set; }Public Property MaxRecordSizeInKB As Integer?
Value
Nullable<Int32> Nullable(Of Int32)

The max record size.

MaxReplicationMessageSize MaxReplicationMessageSize

Edit

Gets or sets the max replication message size. Default value is 50MB. The unit is Bytes.

public long ? MaxReplicationMessageSize { get; set; }Public Property MaxReplicationMessageSize As Long?
Value
Nullable<Int64> Nullable(Of Int64)

The max replication message size.

MaxSecondaryReplicationQueueMemorySize MaxSecondaryReplicationQueueMemorySize

Edit

Gets or sets the max secondary replication queue memory size. Default value is 0, which implies there is no memory limitation. The unit is Bytes

public long ? MaxSecondaryReplicationQueueMemorySize { get; set; }Public Property MaxSecondaryReplicationQueueMemorySize As Long?
Value
Nullable<Int64> Nullable(Of Int64)

The max secondary replication queue size.

MaxSecondaryReplicationQueueSize MaxSecondaryReplicationQueueSize

Edit

Gets or sets the max secondary replication queue size. Default value is 2048. The value must be a power of 2 and the unit is 'Number of operations'

public long ? MaxSecondaryReplicationQueueSize { get; set; }Public Property MaxSecondaryReplicationQueueSize As Long?
Value
Nullable<Int64> Nullable(Of Int64)

The max secondary replication queue size.

MaxStreamSizeInMB MaxStreamSizeInMB

Edit

Deprecated

public int ? MaxStreamSizeInMB { get; set; }Public Property MaxStreamSizeInMB As Integer?
Value
Nullable<Int32> Nullable(Of Int32)

The max stream size.

MaxWriteQueueDepthInKB MaxWriteQueueDepthInKB

Edit

Gets or sets the maximum write queue depth that the core logger can use as specified in kilobytes for the log that is associated with this replica. This value is the maximum number of bytes that can be outstanding during core logger updates. It may be 0 for the core logger to compute an appropriate value or a multiple of 4. The default value is 0. The unit is KB.

public int ? MaxWriteQueueDepthInKB { get; set; }Public Property MaxWriteQueueDepthInKB As Integer?
Value
Nullable<Int32> Nullable(Of Int32)

The max write queue depth.

MinLogSizeInMB MinLogSizeInMB

Edit

Gets or sets the minimum log size. A truncation will not be initiated if it would reduce the size of the to below this value. Default value is 0.

public int ? MinLogSizeInMB { get; set; }Public Property MinLogSizeInMB As Integer?
Value
Nullable<Int32> Nullable(Of Int32)

The minimum log size.

OptimizeForLocalSSD OptimizeForLocalSSD

Edit

Deprecated

public bool ? OptimizeForLocalSSD { get; set; }Public Property OptimizeForLocalSSD As Boolean?
Value
Nullable<Boolean> Nullable(Of Boolean)

If the OptimizeFOrLocalSSD option is enabled.

OptimizeLogForLowerDiskUsage OptimizeLogForLowerDiskUsage

Edit

Gets or sets a flag that when true indicates the log should optimize in a way where less disk space is used for the log at the cost of IO performance. If false, the log will use more disk space but have better IO performance. Default value is true.

public bool ? OptimizeLogForLowerDiskUsage { get; set; }Public Property OptimizeLogForLowerDiskUsage As Boolean?
Value
Nullable<Boolean> Nullable(Of Boolean)

If the OptimizeLogForLowerDiskUsage option is enabled.

ReplicatorAddress ReplicatorAddress

Edit

Gets or sets the address that this replicator will use when communicating with other Replicators. The default value is "localhost:0", which picks a dynamic port number in runtime 

public string ReplicatorAddress { get; set; }Public Property ReplicatorAddress As String
Value
String String

The replicator address.

RetryInterval RetryInterval

Edit

Gets or sets how long the Replicator waits after it transmits a message from the primary to the secondary for the secondary to acknowledge that it has received the message. The default value is 5 seconds.

public TimeSpan? RetryInterval { get; set; }Public Property RetryInterval As TimeSpan?
Value
Nullable<TimeSpan> Nullable(Of TimeSpan)

The retry interval.

SecondaryClearAcknowledgedOperations SecondaryClearAcknowledgedOperations

Edit

Gets or sets a flag that when true indicates the secondary replicator should clear the in-memory queue after acknowledging the operations to the primary (After the operations are flushed to disk) Default value is false. Settings this to "TRUE" can result in additional disk reads on the new primary, while catching up replicas after a failover

public bool ? SecondaryClearAcknowledgedOperations { get; set; }Public Property SecondaryClearAcknowledgedOperations As Boolean?
Value
Nullable<Boolean> Nullable(Of Boolean)

If the SecondaryClearAcknowledgedOperations option is enabled.

SecurityCredentials SecurityCredentials

Edit

Gets or sets the security credentials for securing the traffic between replicators

public SecurityCredentials SecurityCredentials { get; set; }Public Property SecurityCredentials As SecurityCredentials
Value
SecurityCredentials SecurityCredentials

The security credentials.

SharedLogId SharedLogId

Edit

Gets or sets the GUID Identifier for the log container that is shared by a number of replicas on the windows fabric node including this one Default value is "" which causes the replicator to use the global shared log for the node.

public string SharedLogId { get; set; }Public Property SharedLogId As String
Value
String String

The shared log id.

SharedLogPath SharedLogPath

Edit

Gets or sets the full pathname to the log container that is shared by a number of replicas on the node including this one Default value is "" which causes the replicator to use the global shared log for the node.

public string SharedLogPath { get; set; }Public Property SharedLogPath As String
Value
String String

The shared log path.

SlowApiMonitoringDuration SlowApiMonitoringDuration

Edit

Sets the scan interval for managed API calls 

public TimeSpan? SlowApiMonitoringDuration { get; set; }Public Property SlowApiMonitoringDuration As TimeSpan?
Value
Nullable<TimeSpan> Nullable(Of TimeSpan)

ThrottlingThresholdFactor ThrottlingThresholdFactor

Edit

Gets or sets the throttling threshold factor. Throttling will be initiated when the log usage exceeds this value times MinLogSizeInMB. Default value is 3.

public int ? ThrottlingThresholdFactor { get; set; }Public Property ThrottlingThresholdFactor As Integer?
Value
Nullable<Int32> Nullable(Of Int32)

The throttling threshold.

TruncationThresholdFactor TruncationThresholdFactor

Edit

Gets or sets the truncation threshold factor. A truncation will be initiated when the log usage exceeds this value times MinLogSizeInMB. Default value is 2.

public int ? TruncationThresholdFactor { get; set; }Public Property TruncationThresholdFactor As Integer?
Value
Nullable<Int32> Nullable(Of Int32)

The truncation threshold.
